title: Lee Do-kweon
text:
Lee Do-Kweon (born 8 August 1979) is a South Korean <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
Lee made seven <a href="Hungarian%20National%20Championship%20I">Hungarian NB I</a> appearances for <a href="%C3%9Ajpest%20FC">Újpest FC</a> during the 2007–08 season. He also played domestically for <a href="Sangju%20Sangmu%20Phoenix">Icheon Sangmu</a> (while he was in the army), <a href="Goyang%20KB%20Kookmin%20Bank%20FC">Goyang KB Kookmin Bank</a>, <a href="Jeonbuk%20Hyundai%20Motors">Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors</a>, <a href="Gangneung%20City%20FC">Gangneung City FC</a> and <a href="Gimhae%20City%20FC">Gimhae City FC</a>.
